mapper.select: SELECT f.feedcode AS feedcode , u.email AS userid , f.feedtitle AS feedtitle , f.feedcontent AS feedcontent , f.feedimg AS feedimg , f.feedregdate AS feedregdate , f.comment_cnt AS comment_cnt FROM feed_tbl f, user_tbl u WHERE f.userno = u.userno ORDER BY f.feedregdate DESC

SELECT f.feedcode AS feedcode , u.email AS userid , f.feedtitle AS feedtitle , f.feedcontent AS feedcontent , f.feedimg AS feedimg , f.feedregdate AS feedregdate , f.comment_cnt AS comment_cnt FROM feed_tbl f, user_tbl u WHERE f.userno = u.userno AND u.email = #{userid} ORDER BY f.feedregdate DESC
